content:
I am a current Ph.D. candidate majoring in Applied Mathematics and Statistics at Johns Hopkins University. Before that, I received my master’s degree in financial mathematics from Johns Hopkins.
I have rich research experience in Bayesian statistics, teaching experience in machine learning field, and skills in managing large data. Besides these, I have rish experience in quantitative finance field.
I am looking for internship opportunities for summer and winter. Please feel free to contact me if you are interested in talking more details about me.

title: Kunbo Wang
